skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Razor Claws
skillTree.description: Who needs a cumbersome blade when the perfect weapon is literally at your fingertips?

skillTree.name: Hardened Skin
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Feral and Honoured
skillTree.description: This Werekin has been touched by the gods, and the Northmen will follow him into battle with savage abandon.

skillTree.name: Dark Horror
skillTree.description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Fangs
skillTree.description: Don't go anywhere near its mouth - in fact, don't even get within snapping distance if you value your limbs.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Thirst
skillTree.description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Terrifying Howl
skillTree.description: Ringing across miles, the blood curdling cry leaves knees knocking and hands shaking.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Vigour
skillTree.description: Wounds sealing up as quickly as they are open, muscles pumping with unearthly abandon.

skillTree.name: Savage Hunger
skillTree.description: The thirst for rended flesh further fuels the Skin Wolf's unnatural healing abilities.

skillTree.name: Favoured by Khorne
skillTree.description: For this one prays nightly with at his altar of blood.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Bonecrusher" that lowers melee defence and movement speed

skillTree.name: Horrid Blessing
skillTree.description: A transformation so horrific, the very air grows thick with evil, protecting the advancing force of ruin.

skillTree.name: Alpha Wolf
skillTree.description: While these slathering beasts don't exactly communicate with each other, they most certainly know how to follow the biggest and bloodiest in the pack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +3 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +2 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +3 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for all Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Fetid Stench
skillTree.description: Bits of gore left sloughing off and stinking terrify the enemy cavalry, encouraging the wolves to give chase.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +2% for cavalry units
	(local region)

Speed: +3% for all Skin Wolf, Wolves & Warhound units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +4% for cavalry units
	(local region)

Speed: +6% for all Skin Wolf, Wolves & Warhound units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +6% for cavalry units
	(local region)

Speed: +10% for all Skin Wolf, Wolves & Warhound units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpened Claws
skillTree.description: The instinct to scratch their claws against passing rocks ends up grinding their claws into fearsome points.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Bleed" that cause damage over time

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Twisted Flesh
skillTree.description: The raw, corrupted hide of the Skin Wolf, scarred from its many spontaneous transmogrifications, forms a protective, armour-like layer.

skillTree.name: Ruinous Flesh
skillTree.description: Werekin flesh is scored with the symbols and marks of the Dark Gods, granting additional arcane protection to their ravaged physical forms.

skillTree.name: Vicious Assault
skillTree.description: The Dark Gods influence extends to the ferocity of their servants' attacks, increasing their power and reach manyfold.

skillTree.name: Frenzied Assault
skillTree.description: Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)
